question: Can I refinance my mortgage with an outstanding balance of $200,000 and an interest rate of 5%?
true_answer: Yes, you can refinance your mortgage if the new interest rate is favorable. Check closing costs and potential savings.

steps.content: Can I refinance my mortgage with an outstanding balance of $200,000 and an interest rate of 5%?
Plan: 1) Check current interest rates with home_loan_agent. 2) Calculate potential savings with calculator. 3) Consider credit score with credit_agent. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Return answer.
Retrieving current market interest rates for refinancing.
Current market rates are around 3.5% for refinancing.
Calculating potential savings from refinancing at 3.5%.
Estimated monthly payment will decrease significantly if you refinance to 3.5%.
How can my credit score impact the refinancing?
Retrieving information on credit score impact on refinancing.
Higher credit scores can lead to better refinancing rates, typically 700 or above is ideal.
Retrieving knowledge on closing costs for refinancing.
Closing costs typically range from 2% to 5% of the loan amount.
Review complete, all calculations and checks confirmed.
Yes, you can refinance your mortgage if the new interest rate is favorable. Check closing costs and potential savings.
